title: Integrated Instructional Design Course Based on Digital Literacy for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Simulation-based education integrating digital literacy and cognitive presence in blended learning environments

learning_goals: Can analyze clinical scenarios and apply critical thinking using digital tools
Can interpret patient data through VR simulations and enhance cognitive presence by over 80%
Can establish and implement strategies to improve academic achievement by 15% or more in digital environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
